title: forge coverage not showing up contracts.
body:
### Component

Forge

### Have you ensured that all of these are up to date?

- [x] Foundry
- [x] Foundryup

### What version of Foundry are you on?

forge 0.2.0 (2097194 2023-06-23T00:10:47.525915714Z)

### What command(s) is the bug in?

forge coverage

### Operating System

Linux

### Describe the bug

I made two contracts, so when I run forge coverage it is showing stats of only one contract and there is no field for another contract.
Two Contracts in src folder with name: MyToken.sol and KittyToken.sol
When I run forge coverage it is showing stats for MyToken.sol but not for KittyToken.sol

I just thought that maybe it can be due to importing ERC20 contract. Then I put the same code of the contract KittyToken.sol in MyToken.sol and the MyToken.sol contract was gone too from forge coverage table.

![image](https://github.com/foundry-rs/foundry/assets/111875681/fe66c005-3e9e-48e1-9d92-d6810161f374)
![image](https://github.com/foundry-rs/foundry/assets/111875681/2e7c09cd-8e02-4a75-8d05-a6397a4168e2)


When I run forge tree, output is:
